about_the_game:
In a world forever changed by the discovery of the Forbidden Stone, humanity faces the wrath of four ancient gods who unleash chaos upon the land. A father, shattered by the abduction of his daughter, becomes the unwilling hero in this unfolding tragedy. Misunderstood prophecies intertwine with fate, leaving him with no choice but to embark on a perilous quest for revenge.

As he traverses vast landscapes and encounters formidable foes, he must harness his strength and cunning to confront the gods who hold his daughter captive. Each step reveals the hidden secrets of the universe, challenging his beliefs and testing his resolve. With the fate of his family and the world hanging in the balance, he must navigate treacherous realms, solve ancient puzzles, and forge alliances with unlikely companions.

Will he manage to rescue his daughter from the clutches of the gods and reveal the truth behind their punishment of humanity? Or will he fall victim to the same forces that shattered his world?

In Excoverse, players will engage in dynamic combat, explore richly detailed environments, and uncover a deep narrative filled with twists and turns. The protagonist's journey is not just one of vengeance; it is a quest for understanding the true nature of power, sacrifice, and the connections that bind us.

  • Discover different regions with immersive and enchanting atmospheres.

  • From shadowy forests to ancient ruins, each area is filled with unique dangers and secrets.

  • Delve into a rich and detailed universe where magic and science intertwine.

  • Face a variety of enemies and challenging encounters.

  • Fast-paced and action-packed battles in a hack and slash style.

  • Destroy rogue mutants and enhance your character with the artifact development system.

  • Deep character development and customization with RPG elements.

  • A richly developed story with elaborate cutscenes and dialogues.

Prepare for an epic adventure where every decision counts, and the fate of many lies in your hands. Excoverse invites players to delve into a story of courage, betrayal, and the relentless pursuit of hope.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 1030 and higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card which supports DirectSound®
  • Additional Notes: 720p 60fps
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 equivalent or higher
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6 GB and higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card which supports DirectSound®
  • Additional Notes: 1080p 60fps

short_description: In a world ravaged by humanity's forbidden discovery, a father seeks vengeance after his daughter is kidnapped by four ancient gods due to a misunderstood prophecy. As he embarks on a perilous journey, he must confront these deities and unveil the universe's hidden secrets to save her.
